plot: Inspector Montalbano visits a luxury boat driven into Vigata harbor by a storm, because while off the coast the crew found a corpse in a drifting row-boat. This is a murder case because the dead man was both poisoned and disfigured to prevent identification.
title: Il commissario Montalbano" L'età del dubbio
plot_es: Inspector Montalbano visits a luxury boat driven into Vigata harbor by a storm, because while off the coast the crew found a corpse in a drifting row-boat. This is a murder case because the dead man was both poisoned and disfigured to prevent identification.
original_name: Il commissario Montalbano" L'età del dubbio
